value.message:
chore: release v1.34.0 - Developer experience improvements and demo UI enhancements

- Enhanced dependency validation with comprehensive error messages
- Added configuration validation service (BootswatchStartupValidation)
- Improved XML documentation with code examples and remarks
- Rewrote README with step-by-step setup guide and troubleshooting
- Enhanced hero section visibility in demo site across all themes
- Reorganized documentation files to copilot/ folder structure
- Updated package metadata and release notes

No breaking changes - fully backward compatible
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
Add theme switcher to Razor views

Modified `WebSparkBootswatch.cshtml` and `_Layout.cshtml` to integrate a theme switcher. Updated namespace usage for `WebSpark.Bootswatch.Services` and `WebSpark.Bootswatch.Helpers` with an additional `@` symbol. Dynamically set `data-bs-theme` attribute using `BootswatchThemeHelper.GetCurrentColorMode(HttpContext)` to adjust themes based on context.
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
Fix CI/CD issues: multi-targeting and SDK setup

Documented resolution of CI/CD issues in `CI_FIXES_APPLIED.md`.
Updated the demo project to multi-target .NET 8.0, 9.0, and 10.0,
resolving build failures. Enhanced test workflows to set up all
required SDKs, ensuring successful builds for multi-targeted
projects. Verified fixes with successful local tests and outlined
expected CI/CD outcomes. Provided next steps for monitoring,
reviewing, and merging the PR, along with a summary of commits
and success criteria.
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
Merge pull request #1 from markhazleton/upgrade-to-NET10

Upgrade to net10
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
fix: setup all .NET SDKs in multi-framework test workflow

- Add .NET 8.0, 9.0, and 10.0 SDK setup to each test job

- Required because projects now multi-target and need all SDKs during restore

- Resolves NETSDK1045 errors in test-net8 and test-net9 jobs
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
fix: multi-target demo project for CI/CD compatibility

- Change Demo project from single target (net10.0) to multi-target (net8.0;net9.0;net10.0)

- Fixes CI/CD failures in .NET 8.0 and 9.0 test jobs

- Resolves NETSDK1045 and NETSDK1005 errors

- All 33 tests now pass across all frameworks
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
Standardize Git tags and fix GitHub sync issues

- Removed duplicate and inconsistent tags (e.g., `1.0.7` without `v` prefix) to ensure all tags follow the `vMAJOR.MINOR.PATCH` format.
- Resolved GitHub tag visibility issue by synchronizing local and remote tags, ensuring compatibility with workflows.
- Verified and documented the current state of tags, aligning with semantic versioning and project versioning.
- Added detailed instructions for tag creation, pushing, and verification, including troubleshooting steps.
- Established future tagging best practices with clear guidelines for version bumping and tag message formatting.
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
Release version 1.30.0 - Repository enhancements

Updated WebSpark.Bootswatch to version 1.30.0 with significant improvements in repository structure, documentation, and community engagement.

Key changes:
- Updated version to 1.30.0 (assembly, file, and package).
- Enhanced README.md with GitHub NuGet best practices.
- Added community health files: CONTRIBUTING.md, SECURITY.md, CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md.
- Introduced structured CHANGELOG.md and `/copilot/` directory.
- Added professional GitHub issue templates and badges.
- Improved documentation with architecture guides, troubleshooting, and browser compatibility.

No breaking changes; backward compatibility maintained. Repository now adheres to professional open-source standards.
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message: Release version 1.30.0 - Enhanced repository with GitHub NuGet best practices
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
Enhance performance, security, and accessibility

- Added meta tags for SEO and social media sharing.
- Improved accessibility with ARIA roles and skip links.
- Enabled Brotli/Gzip compression and caching strategies.
- Added security headers and HSTS for HTTPS enforcement.
- Redesigned footer with version info and NuGet link.
- Introduced VersionService for dynamic version tracking.
- Added `/debug-version` and `/version-test` pages.
- Configured health checks and static file caching.
- Updated dependencies and improved CSP policies.
- Enhanced responsive design and footer styling.
- Added best practices documentation and testing guides.
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
Update package version and enhance Bootstrap styles

- Updated version number from 1.0.6 to 1.0.7 in WebSpark.Bootswatch.csproj.
- Added numerous CSS rules in bootstrap.min.css to improve styling and functionality of buttons, dropdowns, alerts, and modals, enhancing overall user experience.
- Removed comment regarding bundling and minification in site.css.
- Deleted unused binary file bg-kitchen-jars.jpg.
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message: Update documentation and project metadata with important links and release notes for version 1.0.6
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
Refactor Bootswatch theme switcher implementation

- Updated namespace for services in _ViewImports.cshtml
- Refactored Program.cs to use new Bootswatch theme switcher registration methods
- Removed StyleCache service from the demo project as it is now integrated into Bootswatch
- Simplified JavaScript for theme switching by moving functionality to bootswatch-theme-switcher.js
- Enhanced BootswatchExtensions to include theme switcher and style cache registration
- Bumped version to 1.0.5 in the project file
- Added ThemeSwitcherGuide.md for documentation on theme switcher implementation
- Created ThemeSwitcherExample.cshtml and corresponding PageModel for demo purposes
- Introduced new components for layout and theme switcher to streamline usage
- Added helper methods for theme management in BootswatchThemeHelper
- Implemented StyleCache service for caching Bootswatch styles
- Added JavaScript functionality for theme switching and color mode toggling
value.author: Mark Hazleton
